scripts.prebuild: rm -rf ./docs && mkdir docs && sass --no-source-map ./src/css/main.scss ./docs/css/index.css && cp ./src/html/index.html ./docs/index.html && cp -r ./src/images ./docs/images && cp -r ./src/js ./docs/js && cp ./src/manifest_v1.webmanifest ./docs/manifest_v1.webmanifest
scripts.postbuild: rm ./docs/index.html ./docs/js/index.mjs ./docs/js/links.mjs ./docs/js/projects.mjs && mv ./docs/js/index2.mjs ./docs/js/index.mjs && mv ./docs/js/links2.mjs ./docs/js/links.mjs && mv ./docs/js/projects2.mjs ./docs/js/projects.mjs && html-minifier --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments ./docs/index2.html -o ./docs/index.html && postcss ./docs/css/index.css -r --no-map && rm ./docs/index2.html
